name: Rod of Atos
description: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

abilities.name: Cripple
abilities.description: Launches a projectile at the target enemy, rooting them in place and revealing them.
notes: Can target invisible units and units inside the Fog of War
Cannot target invulnerable or hidden units
Roots the target, preventing them from moving and casting certain mobility abilities
Provides True Sight over affected target
The True Sight pierces debuff immunity, the root does not
Blocked individually on impact by Spell Block
Reflected individually on impact by Spell Reflection

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Gleipnir was purchased as well, Gleipnir's icon takes priority
The item's attributes grant 144 mana, 0.6 mana regeneration and 1.2% flat base magic resistance
12 main attack damage to Intelligence heroes
5.4 main attack damage to universal heroes
